name: Desmos: The REAL Game Engine
description:
I made another game in Desmos.

Here's the link --> https://www.desmos.com/calculator/qwdfohdfcg

Click on your choice, get to the end. 

Don't wake up.

Have Fun!

P.S. I finished this while sleep deprived. So...yeah. Hope it works!

- Made in about 10ish hours for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1! -
